testsuite.test:
audioPath
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

availableMemory
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

backLightOn
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

keypadLightOn
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

language
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

processorUtilizationPercent
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onFlipEvent close
Instructions: 1) Please click 'GO'. 2) Close the clamshell (and open it again to return here).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onFlipEvent open
Instructions: 1) Please click 'GO'. 2) Close and open the clamshell again.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onScreenChangeDimensions does it fire at all
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Change the orientation of the phone (landscape/portrait)!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onScreenChangeDimensions do width height change
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' 2) Switch the widget to mini/floating mode, to change it's dimensions. 3) Switch back to fullscreen mode, the test should have ended successfully.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
